channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rocket Lab stock pops 25% after company reports strong revenue growth, first Neutron deal
item.description: Rocket Lab jumped in post-market trading after the company reported third-quarter results.

item.title: Dow Futures, Bond Yields Edge Down Ahead of Inflation Gauge
item.description: Stock futures edged lower ahead of October consumer-price index data.

item.title: Home Depot’s sales are improving, but it says consumers are still cautious about spending
item.description: Home Depot is mired in a sales slump as homeowners put off major projects.

item.title: German Bunds Seen Staying Rangebound, More Attractive Than U.S. Treasurys
item.description: The 10-year Bund yield was higher and is expected to trade in a range of 2.20%-2.50%, as Jefferies said it is more inclined to buy Bunds rather than T...

item.title: Spotify shares pop on better-than-expected profit forecast
item.description: Shares of Spotify rose in after-hours trading as investors focused on the company's profit forecast more than its third-quarter results.

item.title: Tencent posts better-than-expected 47% profit surge as games, AI tools shine
item.description: Chinese gaming and social media giant Tencent on Wednesday reported profit above analysts' expectations, while revenue missed slightly.

item.title: Blackstone's New Fund for the Rich Is Looking Just About Everywhere for Deals
item.description: Competitors question whether deals the fund has done on its own have been as attractive.

item.title: Home Depot is on the verge of an earnings rebound after quarterly beat and raise
item.description: Same-store sales were better than feared, lifted by this summer's hurricanes in the U.S.

item.title: Spotify Delivers a Strong Encore
item.description: The music streamer’s growing profit margins should keep its gravity-defying stock in orbit.

item.title: Sterling Faces Hit From Repricing of U.K. Rate-Cut Bets
item.description: Sterling fell against the dollar and looks vulnerable to a potential repricing of the market’s cautious interest-rate cut expectations for the BOE, IN...
